abbreviation._instruction: Enter the official abbreviation of this common coordinate space.

author._instruction: If necessary, add one or several authors (person or organization) that contributed to the production and publication of this common coordinate space.

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this common coordinate space. Note that this digital identifier will be used to reference all attached common coordinate space.

hasVersion._instruction: Add one or several versions of this common coordinate space.

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier(s) (IRI) of the related ontological term(s) matching this common coordinate space.

usedSpecies._instruction: Add the species of the specimen that were used to create this common coordinate space.
